pkgmetadata.longdescription: Beam is a Haskell library for type-safe querying and manipulation of SQL databases. Beam is modular and supports various backends. In order to use beam, you will need to use @beam-core@ along with a specific backend (such as @beam-postgres@ or @beam-sqlite@) as well as the corresponding backend. For more information, see the user manual and tutorial on <https://tathougies.github.io/beam GitHub pages>.
